data.name: ErrorBadReminder
data.value: The reminder interval must be a strictly positive integer.

data.name: ErrorBuildingError
data.value: Error retrieving error data. Wow, things are really messed up!

data.name: ErrorClipboardFailure
data.value: Could not complete the operation as the clipboard is being used by another process. Wait a few moments and try again.

data.name: ErrorDownloadFailure
data.value: File failed to download correctly, do you wish to try again?

data.name: ErrorFewScopes
data.value: Warning: The data this ESI key provides is not sufficient for basic EVEMon features.

data.name: ErrorInstallerNotFound
data.value: The installer file could not be found. EVEMon will continue without updating.

data.name: ErrorNoCalendar
data.value: A calendar at that path could not be found.

data.name: ErrorNoDataFile
data.value: Unable to create datafile report

data.name: ErrorNoScopes
data.value: Warning: This ESI key does not authorize any scopes and thus will not provide any data.

data.name: ErrorNoToken
data.value: ESI token could not be obtained.

data.name: ErrorNoTraceFile
data.value: Unable to load trace file for inclusion in report

data.name: ErrorSetClientID
data.value: Please set the ESI Client ID and Client Secret in Settings > Network before adding ESI keys.

data.name: ErrorSSOStartup
data.value: Failed to start SSO server. Check your firewall settings (using port {0:D}) and ensure that only one instance of EVEMon is active while adding ESI keys.

data.name: ErrorTrustFailure
data.value:
Unable to establish a trusted connection to the CCP API servers.
This may be due to an active man-in-the-middle attack or outdated local SSL certificates.
Ensure that the system is up to date with all security patches and try again.

data.name: ErrorUnhandled
data.value:
An error occurred and EVEMon was unable to handle the error message gracefully.
The exception encountered was '{0}'.

data.name: ErrorUnhandledBase
data.value: The original exception encountered was '{0}'.

data.name: ErrorUnhandledEnd
data.value: Please report this on the EVEMon forums.

data.name: MessageBlueprintSelect
data.value: Use the tree on the left to select a blueprint to view.

data.name: MessageCopiedDetails
data.value: The error details have been copied to the clipboard.

data.name: MessageCopiedPlan
data.value: The selected entries have been copied to the clipboard.

data.name: MessageJumpCloneSkills
data.value: {0} has the skill for {1:D} Jump Clones (plus 1 for the implants in your active body)

data.name: MessagePriorityConflict
data.value:
This would result in a priority conflict, either pre-requisites with a lower priority or dependant skills with a higher priority.
Select Yes if you wish to do this and adjust the other skills or No if you do not wish to change the priority.

data.name: PromptClearCache
data.value: Are you sure you want to clear the cache?

data.name: PromptDeletePlan
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this plan?

data.name: PromptIgnoreUpdate
data.value: Are you sure you want to ignore this update? You will not be prompted again until a newer version is released.

data.name: PromptResetSettings
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset settings? Everything will be lost, including the plans.

data.name: MessageGettingStarted
data.value: To begin using EVEMon, select the File >Add Character... menu option, enter your ESI API information and choose the character to monitor.

data.name: ErrorClipboardImport
data.value: Contents of the clipboard is not a valid list of skills or contains invalid skill levels.

data.name: MessageClipboardPlanned
data.value: Pasted skills and all dependencies have already been trained or planned.

data.name: MessageClipboardTrained
data.value: Pasted skills and all dependencies have already been trained.
